p: Compound 246 was evaluated by the agar diffusion method against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria, 246 showed moderate antibacterial activity against both Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442 (13 mm) and Staphylococcus aureus NBRC 13276 (13 mm), respectively, at a concentration of 100 Î¼g/disk [ 81].
